$:/themes/jd/Spartan/Stylesheet.creator: jd
$:/themes/jd/Spartan/Stylesheet.text:
<pre>

@media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.tc-tiddler-edit-frame { z-index: 900 !important;; }
.tc-tiddler-view-frame .tc-storyview-zoomin-tiddler { z-index: 600 !important; }
}

.jd-sidebar-scrollable { z-index: 800; }

.jd-blackout { z-index: 750; }

.jd-search-header { z-index: 700; }

.jd-search-results { z-index: 700; }

.tc-story-river {
    margin: 0 !important;
}

<$list filter="[[$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/stickytitles]text[yes]]">
@media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.tc-tiddler-title {
    top: -2px;
    margin: 0 -14px;
    z-index: 400;
}
.tc-tiddler-view-frame .tc-tiddler-title {
    padding: 4px 14px 6px 14px;
}
.tc-tiddler-edit-frame .tc-tiddler-title {
    padding: 4px 14px 0 14px;
    line-height: 48px;
    border-bottom: 1px dashed <<colour tiddler-editor-border>>;
}
.tc-tiddler-edit-frame .tc-tiddler-controls.tc-titlebar {
    margin-top: -3px;
}
}
@media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.tc-tiddler-view-frame .tc-tiddler-title {
    top: 50px;
    margin: 0 -14px;
    padding-left: 14px;
    padding-right: 14px;
    z-index: 400;
}
.tc-tiddler-edit-frame .tc-tiddler-title {
    position: relative;
    z-index: 400;
}
}
</$list>

.jd-search-results {
    position: fixed;
    top: 54px;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    left: 50%;
    border-bottom: 1px solid <<colour tiddler-border>>;
    border-radius: 2px;
    background: <<colour background>>;
    color: <<colour foreground>>;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.02), 0 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.06);
    overflow: hidden;
}

@media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.jd-search-results {
    width: calc({{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarwidth}}*1.5);
    max-height: 80%;
    border-left: 1px solid <<colour tiddler-border>>;
    border-right: 1px solid <<colour tiddler-border>>;
}
}

@media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.jd-search-results {
    width: calc(100% + 4px);
    max-height: calc(100% - 56px);
    border-left: 1px solid <<colour page-background>>;
    border-right: 1px solid <<colour page-background>>;
}
}

.jd-search-results div.tc-search { display: none; }

<$list filter="[[$:/state/Spartan/tidcontrols]!text[no]]">
@media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
div.tc-titlebar > span.tc-tiddler-controls { opacity: 0; transition: 400ms opacity; }
div.tc-titlebar > span.tc-tiddler-controls:hover { opacity: 1; }
}
</$list>

@media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.tc-tiddler-frame {
    width: 100%;
    border: none;
}
.tc-tiddler-edit-frame span.tc-tiddler-controls button svg {
    fill: <<colour sidebar-controls-foreground>>;
    transition: 400ms fill;
}
.tc-tiddler-edit-frame span.tc-tiddler-controls button:hover svg {
    fill: <<colour sidebar-controls-foreground-hover>>;
}
<$list filter[!has[draft.of]limit[1]]>
.tc-story-river {
    padding-top: 56px !important;
}
</$list>
<$list filter[has[draft.of]limit[1]]>
.tc-story-river {
    padding-top: 0 !important;
}
</$list>
}

.tc-tiddler-frame {
    box-shadow: 1px 1px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
}


@media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.tc-story-river {
    padding-left: 42px !important;
    padding-right: 42px !important;
}
.tc-tiddler-frame {
    padding-top: 16px;
    padding-bottom: 28px;
}
.tc-tiddler-frame {
    width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/tiddlerwidth}};
    margin-left: auto !important;
    margin-right: auto !important;
}
.tc-storyview-zoomin-tiddler {
    width: calc(100% - 84px) !important;
}
}

@media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.tc-tiddler-frame {
    margin-bottom: 1px;
    padding-top: 0;
    padding-bottom: 1em;
}
}

.jd-search-header, 
.jd-sidebar-header,
.jd-header-center,
.jd-search-btns-wrapper,
.jd-search-header > .jd-header-right, 
.jd-search-header > .jd-header-left, 
.jd-search-header > .jd-header-left > button,
.jd-search-header > .jd-header-right > button, 
.jd-sidebar-header > button {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
}

.jd-sidebar-header-title {
    width: 100%;
    font-size: 1.2em;
    font-family: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/codefontfamily}};
    white-space: nowrap;
    overflow: hidden;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
}

@media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.jd-sidebar-header-controls {
    background: <<colour page-background>>;
    padding: 0 14px 14px 14px;
    display: flex;
    flex: 0 0 auto;
    justify-content: space-around;
    align-items: center;
}
}

@media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.jd-sidebar-header-controls { display: none !important; }
}

@media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.jd-sidebar-header > button,
.jd-header-left, .jd-header-right { display: none !important; }
.jd-sidebar-header-title { text-align: center; }
}


.jd-input,
.jd-header-center { width: 100%; }

@media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.jd-desktop-only,
button.jd-desktop-only  { display: none; }
<$list filter="[[$:/state/headersearch]text[yes]]">
.jd-search-header > .jd-header-left { width: auto !important; }
.jd-header-right { display: none !important; }
</$list>
<$list filter="[[$:/state/headersearch]!text[yes]]">
.jd-header-center { display: none; }
</$list>
}

@media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.jd-mobile-only,
button.jd-mobile-only { display: none; }
}

.jd-search-header > .jd-header-center {
    position: relative;
    order: 2;
}

.jd-header-center > .jd-input {
    order: 1;
}

.jd-header-center > .jd-search-btns-wrapper {
    padding: 0 8px;
    border: 1px solid <<colour tiddler-border>>;
    border-left: none;
    border-top-right-radius: 2px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 2px;
    height: 34px;
    justify-content: center;
    background: <<colour background>>;
    order: 3;
}

.jd-header-center > .jd-search-btns-wrapper:only-of-type {
    border: 1px solid <<colour tiddler-border>>;
    border-left: none;
    border-top-right-radius: 2px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 2px;
}

.jd-header-center > .jd-search-btns-wrapper:nth-child(1):not(:only-of-type) {
    padding-right: 0;
    border: 1px solid <<colour tiddler-border>>;
    border-left: none;
    border-right: none;
    border-top-right-radius: 0;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 0;
}

.jd-header-center > .jd-search-btns-wrapper:nth-child(2):not(:only-of-type) {
    padding-left: 0;
}

.jd-search-btns-wrapper button {
    margin: 8px;
}

.jd-sidebar-header {
    width: 100%;
    background: <<colour page-background>>;
    color: <<colour sidebar-controls-foreground>>;
}

.jd-sidebar-header,
.jd-sidebar-header-controls,
div.tc-tab-buttons.jd-sidebar-tabs div.tc-tab-buttons.jd-sidebar-tabs,
div.tc-tab-buttons.jd-sidebar-tabs div.tc-tab-divider.jd-sidebar-tabs,
div.tc-tab-buttons.jd-sidebar-tabs div.tc-tab-content.jd-sidebar-tabs {
    border-left: 1px solid transparent;
    border-right: 1px solid transparent;
}

div.tc-tab-buttons.jd-sidebar-tabs div.tc-tab-buttons.jd-sidebar-tabs,
div.tc-tab-buttons.jd-sidebar-tabs div.tc-tab-divider.jd-sidebar-tabs,
div.tc-tab-buttons.jd-sidebar-tabs div.tc-tab-content.jd-sidebar-tabs {
    width: calc(100% - 1px);
}

@media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.jd-sidebar-header,
.jd-sidebar-header-controls,
div.tc-tab-buttons.jd-sidebar-tabs {
    width: calc(100% - 1px);
}
}

@media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.jd-sidebar-header > button {
    margin-right: 32px;
}
}

@media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.jd-sidebar-header > button {
    margin-right: 16px;
}
}

.jd-search-header {
    position: fixed;
    justify-content: space-between;
    background: <<colour page-background>>;
    border-bottom: 1px solid <<colour tiddler-border>>;
}

@media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.jd-search-header,
.jd-sidebar-header {
    height: 56px;
    padding: 12px 16px;
}
.jd-search-header {
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    left: 50%;
    width: calc({{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarwidth}}*1.5);
    border-left: 1px solid <<colour tiddler-border>>;
    border-right: 1px solid <<colour tiddler-border>>;
    border-bottom-left-radius: 2px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 2px;
}
}

@media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.jd-search-header,
.jd-sidebar-header {
    height: 56px;
    padding: 12px 16px;
}
.jd-search-header {
    border-bottom: 1px solid <<colour tiddler-border>>;
    right: 0;
    left: 0;
}
}

.jd-input {
    height: 34px;
    border: 1px solid <<colour tiddler-border>>;
    border-top-left-radius: 2px;
    border-bottom-left-radius: 2px;
    padding: 6px 12px;
}

@media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.jd-input { width: 100%; }
}

.jd-search-header > .jd-header-right, 
.jd-search-header > .jd-header-left {
    width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarwidth}};
}

.jd-sidebar-header-controls > button,
span.jd-mobile-only > button,
.jd-search-header > .jd-header-right > button, 
.jd-search-header > .jd-header-left > button, 
.jd-sidebar-header > button {
    font-size: 1.5em;
}

.jd-sidebar-header-controls > button svg,
span.jd-mobile-only > button svg,
.jd-search-header > .jd-header-right > button svg, 
.jd-search-header > .jd-header-left > button svg, 
.jd-sidebar-header > button svg {
    fill: <<colour sidebar-controls-foreground>>;
    height: 22pt;
    transition: 400ms fill;
}

.jd-search-btns-wrapper svg {
    fill: <<colour tiddler-controls-foreground>>;
    height: 22pt;
    transition: 400ms fill;
}

.jd-sidebar-header-controls > button:hover svg,
span.jd-mobile-only > button:hover svg,
.jd-search-header > .jd-header-right > button:hover svg, 
.jd-search-header > .jd-header-left > button:hover svg, 
.jd-sidebar-header > button:hover svg {
    fill: <<colour sidebar-controls-foreground-hover>>;
}

.jd-search-btns-wrapper:hover svg {
    fill: <<colour tiddler-controls-foreground-hover>>;
}

.jd-search-header > .jd-header-left {
    justify-content: flex-start;
    order: 1;
}

.jd-search-header > .jd-header-left > button {
    margin: 0 16px 0 0;
    justify-content: flex-start;
}

.jd-search-header > .jd-header-right {
    justify-content: flex-end;
    order: 3;
}

.jd-search-header > .jd-header-right > button {
    margin: 0 0 0 16px;
    justify-content: flex-end;
}


/* Animate.css by Daniel Eden */
/* https://daneden.github.io/animate.css/ */
/* https://github.com/daneden/animate.css */

.animated {
  animation-duration: 225ms;
  animation-fill-mode: both;
  transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.0, 0.0, 0.2, 1);
}

@keyframes slideInLeft {
  from {
    transform: translate3d(-100%, -50%, 0);
    visibility: visible;
  }

  to {
    transform: translate3d(0, -50%, 0);
    top: 50%;
    height: 100%;
  }
}

.slideInLeft {
  animation-name: slideInLeft;
}

@keyframes fadeIn {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
  }

  to {
    opacity: 1;
  }
}

.fadeIn {
  animation-name: fadeIn;
}

@media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
pre::-webkit-scrollbar,
div::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 10px;}
pre::-webkit-scrollbar-track,
div::-webkit-scrollbar-track { background: rgba(0,0,0,0.08); border-radius: 2px; }
pre::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background: rgba(0,0,0,0.1); }
div::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background: rgba(0,0,0,0.08); }
}

h2.tc-title {
    font-size: 0.6em;
}


/* SIDEBAR */

.jd-sidebar-scrollable {
    position: fixed;
    background: <<colour background>>;
    margin: 0;
    border-right: 1px solid <<colour tiddler-border>>;
    overflow: auto;
    box-shadow: 2px 0 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.03), 2px 0 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.07);
}

@media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.jd-sidebar-scrollable {
    left: calc(-{{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarwidth}} + 10px );
    width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarwidth}};
    transition: left 400ms;
    transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(.4,0,.4,1);
}
.jd-sidebar-scrollable:hover {
    left: 0;
}
.jd-sidebar-header,
.jd-sidebar-header-controls,
.tc-tab-set.jd-sidebar-tabs {
    opacity: 0;
    transition: opacity 400ms;
}
.jd-sidebar-scrollable:hover .jd-sidebar-header,
.jd-sidebar-scrollable:hover .jd-sidebar-header-controls,
.jd-sidebar-scrollable:hover .tc-tab-set.jd-sidebar-tabs {
    opacity: 1;
}
}

@media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.jd-sidebar-scrollable {
    width: calc(100% - 70px);
}
<$reveal type="match" state="$:/state/sidebar" text="yes">
.jd-sidebar-scrollable {
    left: 0;
}
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/state/sidebar" text="yes">
.jd-sidebar-scrollable {
    left: -100%;
}
</$reveal>
}

.jd-search-results,
.jd-search-results > .tc-tab-set,
div.tc-tab-set.jd-sidebar-tabs,
.jd-sidebar-scrollable {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
}

.jd-search-results > .tc-tab-set > .tc-tab-buttons,
div.tc-tab-buttons.jd-sidebar-tabs,
.jd-sidebar-header {
    flex: 0 0 auto;
}

.jd-search-results > .tc-tab-set > .tc-tab-content,
div.tc-tab-content.jd-sidebar-tabs,
div.tc-tab-set.jd-sidebar-tabs {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    flex: 1 1 auto;
    overflow-y: auto;
}

.jd-search-results > .tc-tab-set > .tc-tab-buttons,
div.tc-tab-buttons.jd-sidebar-tabs {
    background: <<colour page-background>>;
    padding-left: 16px;
    padding-right: 16px;
    margin: 0 0 -1px 0;
    white-space: nowrap;
    overflow-x: auto;
    overflow-y: hidden;
}

div.tc-tab-buttons.jd-sidebar-tabs > button,
.jd-search-results > .tc-tab-set > .tc-tab-buttons > button {
    color: <<colour sidebar-controls-foreground>>;
    background: <<colour page-background>>;
    border-top: 1px solid <<colour page-background>>;
    border-right: none;
    border-left: none;
    margin: 0;
    border-radius: 0;
    white-space: nowrap; 
    overflow: hidden;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
}

div.tc-tab-buttons.jd-sidebar-tabs > button.tc-tab-selected,
.jd-search-results > .tc-tab-set > .tc-tab-buttons > button.tc-tab-selected {
    border-top: 1px solid <<colour sidebar-tab-border>>;
    border-right: 1px solid <<colour sidebar-tab-border>>;
    border-bottom: 1px solid <<colour background>>;
    border-left: 1px solid <<colour sidebar-tab-border>>;
    border-top-left-radius: 2px;
    border-top-right-radius: 2px;
    color: <<colour foreground>>;
    background: <<colour background>>;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 100;
}

div.tc-tab-buttons.jd-sidebar-tabs > button {
    width: 25%;
}

div.tc-tab-set.jd-sidebar-tabs > div.tc-tab-divider.jd-sidebar-tabs,
.jd-search-results > .tc-tab-set > .tc-tab-divider {
    z-index: 50;
    border-color: <<colour sidebar-tab-border>>;
}

.jd-search-results > .tc-tab-set > .tc-tab-content {
    padding: 0 28px 16px 28px;
    margin: 0;
}

@media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
div.tc-tab-content.jd-sidebar-tabs {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0 32px 16px 32px;
}
}

@media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
div.tc-tab-content.jd-sidebar-tabs {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0 16px 16px 16px;
}
div.tc-tab-content.jd-sidebar-tabs p,
div.tc-tab-content.jd-sidebar-tabs span,
div.tc-tab-content.jd-sidebar-tabs div {
    margin-top: 12px;
    margin-bottom: 12px;
}
div.tc-tab-content.jd-sidebar-tabs div.tc-tab-set button {
    padding-top: 12px;
    padding-bottom: 12px;
    margin-top: 0;
    margin-bottom: 0;
}
}

.tc-more-sidebar > .tc-tab-set > .tc-tab-buttons > button {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 10px;
    border-color: <<colour tab-border-selected>>;
    background: <<colour tab-background>>;
}

.tc-more-sidebar > .tc-tab-set > .tc-tab-buttons > button.tc-tab-selected {
    background: <<colour tab-background-selected>>;
    border-top: 1px solid <<colour tab-border-selected>>;
    border-right: 1px solid <<colour background>>;
    border-bottom: 1px solid <<colour tab-border-selected>>;
    border-left: 1px solid <<colour tab-border-selected>>;
}


/* EDIT FRAME */

.tc-editor-toolbar button { border-radius: 2px; }

.tc-edit-texteditor,
.tc-tiddler-edit-frame input,
.tc-tiddler-edit-frame textarea {
    background: transparent !important;
}
.tc-tiddler-edit-frame input,
.tc-tiddler-edit-frame textarea {
    border-bottom: 1px solid <<colour tiddler-editor-border>> !important;
} 

.tc-tiddler-edit-frame .tc-edit-field-add-name input.tc-edit-texteditor, 
.tc-tiddler-edit-frame .tc-edit-field-add-value input.tc-edit-texteditor, 
.tc-tiddler-edit-frame input.tc-edit-typeeditor.tc-popup-handle, 
.tc-tiddler-edit-frame input.tc-edit-texteditor.tc-popup-handle {
    border-bottom: 1px solid <<colour tiddler-editor-border>>;
    <<box-shadow "none">>
} 

.tc-tiddler-edit-frame input,
.tc-tiddler-edit-frame textarea,
.tc-tiddler-edit-frame iframe.tc-edit-texteditor {
    font-size: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/bodyfontsize}};
    font-family: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/fontfamily}};
    border: 1px solid <<colour background>>; 
    <<box-shadow "none">>
}

.tc-tiddler-edit-frame input.tc-titlebar.tc-edit-texteditor {
    border: none;
    font-size: 14pt;
    font-weight: 400;
    <<box-shadow "none">>
}

.tc-message-box {
    margin: -14px -1px;
}

.tc-editor-toolbar {
    background: <<colour tiddler-editor-border>> !important;
    margin-top: 0;
}

.tc-editor-toolbar button {
    fill: <<colour primary>>;
    background: transparent !important;
    transition: fill 400ms;
}

.tc-tiddler-frame iframe.tc-edit-texteditor {
    margin-top: 0;
}

.tc-editor-toolbar button:hover {
    fill: <<colour muted-foreground>>;
}

@media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.tc-editor-toolbar {
    box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.02), 0 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.06);
}
}

@media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.tc-story-river {
    padding-top: 28px !important;
}
<$list filter="[[$:/state/headersearch]!text[yes]]">
.jd-search-header {
    top: -56px;
}
</$list>
<$list filter="[[$:/state/headersearch]text[yes]]">
.jd-search-header {
    top: 0px;
    box-shadow: 0 1px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.02), 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.06);
}
</$list>
}

@media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
<$list filter="[has[draft.of]limit[1]]">
.tc-story-river {
    padding-top: 0 !important;
}
.jd-search-header {
    top: -56px;
}
</$list>
<$list filter="[!has[draft.of]limit[1]]">
.tc-story-river {
    padding-top: 56px !important;
}
.jd-search-header {
    top: 0;
}
</$list>

.tc-tiddler-edit-frame {
    position: fixed;
    padding: 0;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    height: 100%;
    right: 0;
    overflow: auto;
}

.tc-editor-toolbar {
    position: sticky;
    top: -1px;
    margin: 0;
}

div.tc-tiddler-title.tc-tiddler-edit-title {
    color: transparent;
    background: <<colour page-background>>;
    font-size: 0px;
    padding-top: 6px;
}

.tc-tiddler-edit-frame span.tc-tiddler-controls.tc-titlebar {
    padding-right: 14px;
    font-size: 30px !important;
}

.tc-tiddler-edit-frame input.tc-titlebar.tc-edit-texteditor {
    padding: 0 14px 6px 14px;
    margin: 0;
    border-bottom: 1px solid transparent !important;
    background: <<colour page-background>> !important;
    color: <<colour sidebar-controls-foreground>> !important;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.02), 0 3px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.06);
}

.tc-tiddler-edit-frame textarea {
    border-color: transparent !important;
    padding: 14px !important;
}

}


.tc-tiddler-edit-frame .tc-edit-tags,
.tc-tiddler-edit-frame .tc-type-selector,
.tc-tiddler-edit-frame .tc-edit-fields,
.tc-edit-field-add { display: none; }

.sp-editor-item .tc-edit-field-add,
.sp-editor-item .tc-edit-tags,
.sp-editor-item .tc-type-selector,
.sp-editor-item .tc-edit-add-tag {
     display: inline-block !important;
     border: 1px solid transparent;
}

.sp-editor-item .tc-edit-fields {
     display: block !important;
     border: 1px solid transparent;
}

.sp-editor-more { background: transparent; padding-top: 0;  padding-bottom: 0; border: none; }

.sp-editor-item {
     width: 100%;
     border-bottom: 1px dashed <<colour tiddler-editor-border>>;
}

@media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.sp-editor-more { 
    padding-right: 0;
    padding-left: 0;
    border-top: 1px solid <<colour tiddler-editor-border>>;
    border-bottom: 1px solid <<colour tiddler-editor-border>>;
}
.tc-tiddler-info {
    margin: 0;
}
}

.sp-editor-item table.tc-edit-fields { margin: 0; padding: 0; }

.sp-editor-item .tc-edit-tags,
.sp-editor-item .tc-type-selector,
.sp-editor-item .tc-edit-field-add {
     border-top: none;
     border-right: none;
     border-left: none;
}
.sp-editor-item .tc-edit-tags,
.sp-editor-item .tc-edit-field-add {
     padding: 4px 8px;
}

.sp-editor-item .tc-type-selector {
     padding: 8px;
     border-bottom: none;
}

.tc-tiddler-info .sp-editor-item:nth-last-child(1) {
     border-bottom: none;
}

.sp-editor-item table.tc-edit-fields { padding: 0; width: 100%; }

.sp-editor-item table.tc-edit-fields tbody,
.sp-editor-item table.tc-edit-fields tr { width: 100%; display: block; }

.sp-editor-item table.tc-edit-fields .tc-edit-field-name {
    min-width: 80px;
    max-width: 80px;
    overflow: hidden;
    word-break: normal;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
}

.sp-editor-item table.tc-edit-fields .tc-edit-field-value {
    width: 100%;
}

.sp-editor-item table.tc-edit-fields .tc-edit-field-remove {
    min-width: 42px;
}

.sp-editor-item table.tc-edit-fields .tc-edit-field-remove button {
    padding: 4px;
    width: 100%;
    text-align: center;
}


/* TAB BUTTONS */

.tc-tab-buttons { margin-bottom: -1px; }

.tc-tab-buttons button { padding: 8px 12px !important; }


/* DROPDOWNS */

.tc-block-dropdown,
.tc-drop-down {
    border: none !important;
    border-radius: 2px !important;
    font-size: calc({{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/bodyfontsize}} + 2px) !important;
    line-height: 1.8 !important;
    font-weight: 400 !important;
    box-shadow: 0 1px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.1), 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
}

.tc-block-dropdown button,
.tc-block-dropdown .tc-tiddlylink,
.tc-drop-down button,
.tc-drop-down .tc-tiddlylink {
    font-size: calc({{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/bodyfontsize}} + 2px) !important;
    font-weight: 400 !important;
}

.tc-block-dropdown a {
    padding: 0 14px 0 14px;
    font-weight: 400 !important;
}


@media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.tc-block-dropdown,
.tc-drop-down {
    position: fixed !important;
    top: calc(50% - 20px) !important;
    left: 50% !important;
   -webkit-transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
   -moz-transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
   -ms-transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
   -o-transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    min-width: calc(100% - 84px);
    max-width: calc(100% - 84px);
    min-height: auto;
    max-height: calc(100vh - 180px) !important;
    border: none;
    overflow-y: auto;
}
}

@media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.tc-block-dropdown,
.tc-drop-down {
    min-height: auto;
    max-height: 500px;
    min-width: 300px;
    max-width: 300px;
    overflow-y: auto;
}
}


/* MISC */

.tc-tiddlylink, .tc-menu-list-item {
    white-space: normal !important;
    word-wrap: break-word !important;
}

.tc-notification {
    border-radius: 2px;
    box-shadow: 0 1px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.1), 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
}

table input, table textarea,
html button {
    border-style: solid;
    border-radius: 2px;
}

select, table input, table textarea {
    padding: 4px;
    margin: 4px;
    border-top: none;
    border-left: none;
    border-right: none;
    border-color: <<colour table-border>>;
    background: <<colour dropdown-background>>;
}

hr {
    border: 0;
    height: 1.5px;
    background-image: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0), <<colour table-border>>, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0));
}
@media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
input, textarea, button, select {
    outline: none;
}
}

@media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
<$list filter="[[$:/state/sidebar]text[yes]]">
.jd-blackout {
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.35);
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 0;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    cursor: default;
    outline: none;
}
</$list>
<$list filter="[[$:/state/sidebar]!text[yes]]">
.jd-blackout {
    display: none;
}
</$list>
}
@media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
.jd-blackout {
    display: none;
}
}

<$list filter="[[$:/plugins/danielo515/ContextPlugin]!is[missing]]">
.jd-search-results div.tw-search { display: none; }

.jd-search-results .tw-context { color:  <<colour foreground>>; }

.jd-search-results .matched { background: <<colour primary>>; color:  <<colour background>>; }
</$list>

</pre>
$:/themes/jd/Spartan/Stylesheet.title: $:/themes/jd/Spartan/Stylesheet

$:/themes/jd/Spartan/Template.creator: jd
$:/themes/jd/Spartan/Template.text:
\define config-title() $:/config/PageControlButtons/Visibility/$(listItem)$ \define emptyMessage()
{{$:/language/Search/Search/TooShort}}. Adjust minimum search length [[here|$:/config/Search/MinLength]]
esc : clear searchbar
enter : create tiddler out of search bar text
alt + 1 : toggle search results
tab : scroll through search tabs and results
''Other shortcuts:''
`.s` + enter : save wiki
`.o Tiddler` + enter : open `Tiddler` in story river
`.e Tiddler` + enter : edit `Tiddler` if existing, create new if not existing
\end <$set filter="[search:title[$:/state/searchtab-]!sort[modified]limit[1]]" name="searchTabState"> <$keyboard key="enter" actions=""" <$list filter="[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]get[text]prefix[.o ]][[$:/temp/advancedsearch]get[text]prefix[.e ]title[.s]]" variable="stateChecker"> <$list filter="[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]get[text]removeprefix[.o ]]" variable="listItem"> <$action-navigate $to=<>/> <$list filter="[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]get[text]removeprefix[.e ]]" variable="listItem"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title=<>/> <$list filter="[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]text[.s]]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-save-wiki"/> <$list filter="[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]get[text]]" variable="stateChecker"> <$list filter="[!prefix[.o]!prefix[.e]!prefix[.s]]" variable="checked"> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle="New Tiddler" text={{$:/temp/advancedsearch}} $savetitle="$:/temp/lastCreated"/> <$action-navigate $to={{$:/temp/lastCreated}}/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" text=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/headersearch" text="no"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Standard"/> """> <$keyboard key="escape" actions=""" <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" text=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/headersearch" text="no"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Standard"/> """> <$keyboard tag="div" key="alt+1" class="jd-search-header" actions=""" <$list filter="[[$:/state/searchtab/dropdown]!text[no]]"><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/searchtab/dropdown" text="no"/> <$list filter="[[$:/state/searchtab/dropdown]text[no]]"><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/searchtab/dropdown" text="yes"/> """>
<$list filter="[[$:/state/sidebar]!text[yes]]"> <$button set="$:/state/sidebar" setTo="yes" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/menu-button}} <$list filter="[[$:/state/sidebar]text[yes]]"> <$button set="$:/state/sidebar" setTo="no" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/menu-button}}
<$list filter="[[$:/state/headersearch]!text[yes]]"> <$button set="$:/state/headersearch" setTo="yes" class="tc-btn-invisible animated fadeIn">{{$:/core/images/advanced-search-button}} <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/PageControls]!has[draft.of]]" variable="listItem"> <$list filter="[title!text[hide]]" variable="lister"> <$set name="tv-config-toolbar-class" filter="[] [encodeuricomponent[]addprefix[tc-btn-]]"> <$transclude tiddler=<> mode="inline"/>
<$list filter="[[$:/state/headersearch]text[yes]]">
<$list filter="[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]!text[]]">
<$list filter="[{$:/temp/advancedsearch}minlength{$:/config/Search/MinLength}limit[1]]" variable="listItem"> <$list filter="[text[$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter]]"> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/AdvancedSearch/FilterButton]!has[draft.of]]-[[$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter/FilterButtons/clear]]-[[$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter/FilterButtons/dropdown]]"><$transclude/> <$list filter="[[$:/state/searchtab/dropdown]!text[no]]" variable="listItem"> <$button set="$:/state/searchtab/dropdown" setTo="no" class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/chevron-up}} <$list filter="[[$:/state/searchtab/dropdown]text[no]]" variable="listItem"> <$button set="$:/state/searchtab/dropdown" setTo="yes" class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/chevron-down}}
{{$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter/FilterButtons/dropdown}} <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" text=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/headersearch" text="no"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Standard"/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" tag="input" class="jd-input" placeholder="search or create, 'esc' to close search" focus="yes"/>
<$set name="searchTiddler" value="$:/temp/advancedsearch"> <$list filter="[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]!text[]]" variable="listItem"> <$keyboard key="escape" actions=""" <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" text=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/headersearch" text="no"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Standard"/> """> <$keyboard key="alt+1" actions=""" <$list filter="[[$:/state/searchtab/dropdown]!text[no]]"><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/searchtab/dropdown" text="no"/> <$list filter="[[$:/state/searchtab/dropdown]text[no]]"><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/searchtab/dropdown" text="yes"/> """> <$list filter="[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]!text[]]"> <$reveal tag="div" class="jd-search-results" state="$:/state/searchtab/dropdown" type="nomatch" text="no"> <$list filter="[{$:/temp/advancedsearch}minlength{$:/config/Search/MinLength}limit[1]]" emptyMessage=<> variable="listItem"> <$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/AdvancedSearch]!has[draft.of]]" default="$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Standard" state="$:/state/searchtab"/>
<$button set="$:/state/sidebar" setTo="no" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/menu-button}}
{{$:/SiteTitle}}
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/PageControls]!has[draft.of]]" variable="listItem"> <$list filter="[title!text[hide]]" variable="lister"> <$set name="tv-config-toolbar-class" filter="[] [encodeuricomponent[]addprefix[tc-btn-]]"> <$transclude tiddler=<> mode="inline"/>
<$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/SideBar]!has[draft.of]]" default={{$:/config/DefaultSidebarTab}} state="$:/state/tab/sidebar" class="jd-sidebar-tabs"/>
<$button set="$:/state/sidebar" setTo="no" class="jd-blackout animated fadeIn">

<$button set="$:/state/sidebar" setTo="no" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/HideSideBar/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/HideSideBar/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/chevron-right}}</$button>
</$reveal>
<$reveal state="$:/state/sidebar" type="match" text="no">
<$button set="$:/state/sidebar" setTo="yes" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/ShowSideBar/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/ShowSideBar/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/chevron-left}}</$button>
</$reveal>

$:/core/ui/PageTemplate/sidebar.text:

$:/themes/jd/Spartan/themetweaks.creator: jd
$:/themes/jd/Spartan/themetweaks.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/ThemeTweaks/ !! Tweaks for Spartan Theme |Hover on tiddler controls for visibility (on desktop)
//unchecked = always visible // |<$checkbox tiddler="$:/state/Spartan/tidcontrols" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="yes"> | Select [[day palette|$:/state/Spartan/palette/day]]: <$select tiddler="$:/state/Spartan/palette/day" default="$:/palette/Vanilla"> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Palette]sort[title]]" variable="listItem"> Select [[night palette|$:/state/Spartan/palette/night]]: <$select tiddler="$:/state/Spartan/palette/night" default="$:/palette/Rocker"> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Palette]sort[title]]" variable="listItem"> !! Selected tweaks from Vanilla Theme |<$link to="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/stickytitles"><>
//<>// |<$select tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/stickytitles"> | |<$link to="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/fontfamily"><> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/fontfamily" default="" tag="input"/> | |<$link to="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/codefontfamily"><> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/codefontfamily" default="" tag="input"/> | |<$link to="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/editorfontfamily"><> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/editorfontfamily" default="" tag="input"/> | |<$link to="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/fontsize"><> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/fontsize" default="" tag="input"/> | |<$link to="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/lineheight"><> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/lineheight" default="" tag="input"/> | |<$link to="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/bodyfontsize"><> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/bodyfontsize" default="" tag="input"/> | |<$link to="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/bodylineheight"><> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/bodylineheight" default="" tag="input"/> | |<$link to="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/tiddlerwidth"><>
//<>//
|^<$edit-text tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/tiddlerwidth" default="" tag="input"/> | |<$link to="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint"><>
//<>// |^<$edit-text tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint" default="" tag="input"/> | |<$link to="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarwidth"><> |^<$edit-text tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarwidth" default="" tag="input"/> |
$:/themes/jd/Spartan/themetweaks.title: $:/themes/jd/Spartan/themetweaks
$:/themes/jd/Spartan/themetweaks.caption: Spartan Theme Tweaks

<$transclude tiddler=<>/>

$:/themes/jd/Spartan/button/tiddler-more.text: \whitespace trim \define editState() $:/state/Spartan/tiddler-more/$(currentTiddler)$ \define button-content() <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/options-button}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Info/Caption}}/> \end <$list filter="[text[yes]]" variable="buttonState"> <$button set=<> setTo="no" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Info/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Info/Caption}} class=<>> <$macrocall $name="button-content" mode="inline"/> <$list filter="[!text[yes]]" variable="buttonState"> <$button set=<> setTo="yes" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Info/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Info/Caption}} class=<>> <$macrocall $name="button-content" mode="inline"/>

$:/themes/jd/Spartan/button/day-night-mo.creator: jd
$:/themes/jd/Spartan/button/day-night-mo.text:
<$set name="daypalette" filter="[[$:/state/Spartan/palette/day]get[text]]" emptyValue="$:/palettes/Vanilla">
<$set name="nightpalette" filter="[[$:/state/Spartan/palette/night]get[text]]" emptyValue="$:/palettes/Rocker">
<$list filter="[title[$:/palette]text<daypalette>]">
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" set="$:/palette" setTo=<<nightpalette>> tooltip="set to night palette">
{{$:/themes/jd/Spartan/images/night}}
</$button>
</$list>
<$list filter="[title[$:/palette]!text<daypalette>]">
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" set="$:/palette" setTo=<<daypalette>> tooltip="set to day palette">
{{$:/themes/jd/Spartan/images/day}}
</$button>
</$list>
</$set>
</$set>
$:/themes/jd/Spartan/button/day-night-mo.title: $:/themes/jd/Spartan/button/day-night-mode
$:/themes/jd/Spartan/button/day-night-mo.caption: {{$:/jd/images/day}} day / night mode
